component.name: Claude Session Viewer
component.summary: Native KDE viewer for Claude Code session logs

description.p: Claude Session Viewer reads Claude Code session logs from ~/.claude/projects/ and presents them in a structured, visual interface. Every file read, regex search, diff applied, command run, and token consumed is reconstructed from the raw JSONL logs and displayed with specialized viewers.

ul.li: Full session reconstruction from JSONL logs
Cross-session full-text search with Ctrl+K command palette
Desktop notifications for file access patterns and errors

description.p: Initial release with full session viewing, search, notifications, multi-pane tabs, and SSH support.
